short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find and unsubscribe from unwanted emails with one click. Highlights and scrolls to unsubscribe links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Unsubscribe is a Chrome extension that helps you easily find and unsubscribe from unwanted emails. With just one click, it scans your email for common unsubscribe phrases and highlights the relevant link in green. 

Plus, the extension automatically scrolls to the highlighted text, making it even easier to quickly unsubscribe. Say goodbye to cluttered inboxes and start taking control of your emails today.

Smart Unsubscribe does not collect or store any user data, ensuring complete privacy while using the extension.
